name: Homemade Bread
author: St. Augustine Cafeteria
instructions: Mix yeast, 2 cups warm water and 2 tablespoons of sugar; set aside. Mix dry milk, salt, 1 cup sugar and 3 of the flour together. Add water, yeast mixture and shortening. Mix well. Then add rest of the flour. Knead and let rise until double. Makes about 9 (2 pound) loaves. Bake at 400° for 15 minutes, 350° for 45 minutes.
